alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Itasca; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 3:34PM CST until January 17 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Koochiching, North St. Louis, Northern Cook and Lake, North Itasca, Central St. Louis, Southern Lake, Southern Cook, South Itasca and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band, the Grand Portage Reservation and the Bois Forte Band, Nett Lake, Lake Vermilion and, Deer Creek areas. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
